snippet: Nik Wallenda, who persuaded New York and Canada to allow him to cross the cataracts, said he had scheduled the event for June 15.
abstract: Nik Wallenda announces that he has scheduled tightrope walk over Niagara Falls for June 15, following months of wrangling with New York State and Canadian officials for permission. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: Fans of funambulists can finally mark their calendars. Nik Wallenda, the seventh-generation circus performer who persuaded the New York State and Canadian governments to allow him to cross Niagara Falls on a tightrope, announced on Wednesday that he would undertake his walk on June 15.

headline.main: Acrobat Schedules Walk Over Niagara Falls
